SELECT USR_ID AS memberId, USR_NM AS memberName, USR_PW AS memberPwd, USR_EMAIL AS memberEmail, IFNULL(USR_TELNO,"") AS memberTel, ALARM_EMAIL AS alarmEmail, ALARM_SMS AS alarmSMS, ALARM_KAKAO AS alarmKakao, IFNULL(SHINHAN_MANER,"") AS shinhanManer, RECV_YN AS recvYn, GRP_CD AS grpCd,
APPR_YN AS apprYn, DEL_YN AS delYn FROM user_info
WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND 1=1
AND USR_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{srch2}),'%')
AND USR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{srch3}),'%')
AND 1=1
AND APPR_YN = #{srch4}
AND MANUAL_YN = #{srch6]
ORDER BY USR_ID
ORDER BY USR_ID DESC
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{startPage}

SELECT count(*) FROM user_info
WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND 1=1
AND USR_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{srch2}),'%')
ANDUSR_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{srch3}),'%')
AND 1=1
AND APPR_YN = #{srch4}

SELECT USR_ID AS memberId ,CMPNY_NM AS compName ,TAX_NO AS compRegNo ,MANER_YN AS mangerYn ,DEL_YN AS delYn FROM USER_CMPNY_INFO WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
AND USR_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{srch2}),'%')
AND CMPNY_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{srch5}),'%')
ORDER BY CMPNY_NM
ORDER BY CMPNY_NM DESC
ORDER BY USR_ID
ORDER BY USR_ID DESC
ORDER BY CMPNY_NM
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{startPage}
